long_description: This fragrance-free sun protection is great for outdoor activities. Fine mist sprays evenly and dries quickly, leaving no greasy residue on hands, accessories or equipment. Oil- and alcohol-free hypoallergenic formula won't block pores or dry pores. Contains dermatologist-recommended Parsol 1789, offering the highest protection against damaging UVA rays; additional ingredients block UVB rays. Water- and sweat-resistant formula won't run into eyes. Ergonomic bottle is durable and easy to grip.
short_description: This fragrance-free sun protection is great for outdoor activities.
